Record.ClassificationPath: Findings_and_Disorders_Kind/Disease, Disorder or Finding/Disease or Disorder/Disorder by Site/Respiratory and Thoracic Disorder/Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Thoracic Disorder/Non-Neoplastic Heart Disorder/Arrhythmia/Supraventricular Arrhythmia/Sinus Arrest
Record.Description: A failure of impulse formation in the sinus node. Sinus arrest is indistinguishable from third degree sinoatrial exit block on the standard ECG.
